content: मंजुल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मंजु-सिध्मा° लच्, मंज्-उ लच् वा] Lovely, beautiful, agreeable, charming, sweet, melodious (voice &c.); संप्रति मंजुलवंजुलसीमनि केलिशयनमनुयातं <ls>Gīt. 11</ls>; कूजितं राजहंसानां वर्धते मदमंजुलं <ls>Kāv. 2. 334.</ls> --लः A kind of gallinule. --लं {@--1@} An arbour, a bower. {@--2@} A spring, well. {@--3@} The state of being variegated.
